comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Presumably en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edmund_von_Mach See onlinebooks.library.upenn.edu/webbin/book/lookupname?key=... for books he wrote.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: He caused a stir with his pro-German book "What Germany Wants" (1914), see article in the NYT, November 15, 1914 (query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F20E1EF93E5B17...), with portrait.

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks swanq for providing his full name and B-59 for finding a photo confirmation.We will update our records.
